name: @codevise/activeadmin-searchable_select
description: Use searchable selects based on Select2 in Active Admin forms and filters.
author: Codevise Solutions Ltd <info@codevise.de>

scripts.prepare_javascripts_src: rm -rf src && cp -R app/assets/javascripts/active_admin/ src && mv src/searchable_select_pack.js src/searchable_select.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepare_javascripts_src && npm run prepare_stylesheets_src
